data.subject: Losing weight is extremely diffucult
data.message: Statistics indicate that during any given time period, approximately one-quarter of all men and women in the United States are dieting to lose weight. Losing weight is not the problem, keeping it off is a challenge!!. Estimates indicate 75% to 90% of all dieters who lose weight can expect to regain all of the weight they lost within one year of completing the diet. But good eating habits with a program of  exercise, including  aerobic training and weight training can successfully keep those extra pounds away forever.
